Mark William Pocan (; born August 14, 1964) is an American politician and businessman. He is the U.S. Representative for Wisconsin's 2nd congressional district since 2013. He is a member of the Democratic Party, Pocan is Co-Chair of both the Congressional Progressive Caucus and the Congressional LGBT Equality Caucus.
From 1999 to 2013 he was a member of the Wisconsin State Assembly.
In January 2020, Pocan endorsed Senator Bernie Sanders for President.
